trans-unit.source: Performs a cryptographic transformation of data using the Rijndael algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 执行加密转换的数据，使用 Rijndael 算法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Using this class is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]1> 不建议使用此类。

trans-unit.source: A better practice is to use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged> with a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> object.
trans-unit.target: 更好的做法是使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>与<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>对象。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> object handles the padding issues that can occur when using RijndaelManagedTransform directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>对象处理通过直接使用 RijndaelManagedTransform 时可能发生的填充问题。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>类。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateEncryptor%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateDecryptor%2A> methods return an instance of the RijndaelManagedTransform class that is initialized with the key information of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged> object.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateEncryptor%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateDecryptor%2A>方法返回使用当前的密钥信息初始化 RijndaelManagedTransform 类的实例<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>对象。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateDecryptor%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateEncryptor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To encrypt or decrypt data using the Rijndael algorithm, pass the RijndaelManagedTransform object returned by these methods to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要加密或解密数据，使用 Rijndael 算法，将传递到这些方法返回的 RijndaelManagedTransform 对象<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>对象。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream>

trans-unit.source: Gets the block size.
trans-unit.target: 获取块的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the data blocks in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 以字节为单位的数据块大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current transform can be reused.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以重复使用当前转换。

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether multiple blocks can be transformed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以转换多个块。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple blocks can be transformed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以转换多个块;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放使用的所有资源<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This method is a simple call to <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是对<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName>类</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的简单调用

trans-unit.source: Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 调用`Dispose`允许使用的资源<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>可以重新分配用于其他目的。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`Dispose`，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放当前实例所使用的所有资源<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>.
trans-unit.target: 调用`Dispose`在完成使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>时

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`方法使<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>中不可用状态。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>占用。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用`Dispose`在发布到<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>最后一个引用之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它所使用的资源之前，不会释放垃圾回收器调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>对象的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform>

trans-unit.source: Gets the input block size.
trans-unit.target: 获取输入的块大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the input data blocks in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 输入数据块的大小以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the output block size.
trans-unit.target: 获取输出块大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the output data blocks in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 输出数据块的大小以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Resets the internal state of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform"></xref> so it can be used again to do a different encryption or decryption.
trans-unit.target: 重置的内部状态<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform"></xref>以便它可再次执行不同的加密或解密。

trans-unit.source: The Reset method is called automatically when you call <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform.TransformFinalBlock%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform.TransformFinalBlock%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManagedTransform.TransformFinalBlock%2A>时将自动调用 Reset 方法

trans-unit.source: The Reset method is not called when, for example, the encrypted input data is garbage and cannot be decrypted.
trans-unit.target: 重置方法不被调用时，例如，加密输入的数据是乱码，无法解密。

trans-unit.source: In this case, an exception is thrown and Reset is not called.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，引发异常，则不会调用重置。

trans-unit.source: You can choose to manually call the Reset method in this case.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择手动在这种情况下调用重置方法。

trans-unit.source: Computes the transformation for the specified region of the input byte array and copies the resulting transformation to the specified region of the output byte array.
trans-unit.target: 计算输入的字节数组的指定区域转换并将生成的转换复制到输出字节数组的指定区域。

trans-unit.source: The input to perform the operation on.
trans-unit.target: 要对其执行操作的输入。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the input byte array to begin using data from.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量输入的字节数组中开始使用中的数据。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the input byte array to use as data.
trans-unit.target: 要用作数据的输入的字节数组中的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The output to write the data to.
trans-unit.target: 要将数据写入的输出。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the output byte array to begin writing data from.
trans-unit.target: 为输出字节数组开始写入从数据偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: 写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The inputBuffer parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The inputBuffer parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The outputBuffer parameter is .
trans-unit.target: -or- The outputBuffer parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The length of the input buffer is less than the sum of the input offset and the input count.
trans-unit.target: 输入缓冲区的长度小于输入的偏移量和输入的计数的总和。

trans-unit.source: -or- The value of the inputCount parameter is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: -的值 inputCount 参数是否小于或等于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- The value of the inputCount parameter is greater than the length of the inputBuffer parameter.
trans-unit.target: -的值 inputCount 参数的长度大于 inputBuffer 参数。

trans-unit.source: -or- The length of the inputCount parameter is not evenly devisable by input block size.
trans-unit.target: -的长度 inputCount 参数不是均匀设计按输入的块大小。

trans-unit.source: The value of the inputOffset parameter is negative.
trans-unit.target: 值 inputOffset 参数是负数。

trans-unit.source: Computes the transformation for the specified region of the specified byte array.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定的字节数组的指定区域转换。

trans-unit.source: The input to perform the operation on.
trans-unit.target: 要对其执行操作的输入。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the byte array to begin using data from.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量开始使用中的数据的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the byte array to use as data.
trans-unit.target: 要用作数据的字节数组中的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The computed transformation.
trans-unit.target: 计算所得的转换。

trans-unit.source: The inputBuffer parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The inputBuffer parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The value of the inputCount parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 值 inputCount 参数小于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- The value of the inputCount parameter is grater than the length of inputBuffer parameter.
trans-unit.target: -的值 inputCount 参数是的长度大于 inputBuffer 参数。

trans-unit.source: The value of the inputOffset parameter is negative.
trans-unit.target: 值 inputOffset 参数是负数。

trans-unit.source: The length of the inputCount parameter is not evenly devisable by input block size.
trans-unit.target: 长度 inputCount 参数不是均匀设计按输入的块大小。
